bibliography.author: Al-Awadi, N.
Taylor, R.
bibliography.title: The mechanism of thermal eliminations. Part 20. The relative rates of pyrolysis of the 2-ethoxy, 2-isopiopoxy, and 2-t-butoxy derivatives of pyrazine and pyrimidine to pyrazin-2-one and pyrimidin-2-one, respectively: polarity of the transition states and the importance of nucleophilic attack
